name: Subwall: Secretive
description:
Wake up in front of a wall and there is only one way to escape. We have to find that way.

I made this game inspired by my favorite Submachine Serie. I hope to do much better. This game is the first game in the Subwall serie. I hope you will like it.

Spacial thanks to; Sound Effect from Pixabay and Scratch.mit.edu, Sound converters: freeconvert.com, convertio.co, Arts; Gdevelop, piskel, pixilart.com, Engine; Gdevelop 5
